comment: Given a constant function, its preimage with respect to an unbounded below, open interval, with upper bound larger than the constant, is the whole domain. First part of Proposition 121E (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
